data.chText: 人的身体（或精神）状况；健康
data.enText: the condition of a person's body or mind
Exhaust fumes are bad for your health.

data.chText: 健康状况不好 / 好 / 极好 / 好极
data.enText: to be in poor/good/excellent/the best of health
Smoking can seriously damage your health .
mental health
the state of being physically and mentally healthy

data.chText: 他在妻子的照料下恢复了健康。
data.enText: He was nursed back to health by his wife.

data.chText: 她容光焕发，显然生活得很快活。
data.enText: She was glowing with health and clearly enjoying life.

data.chText: 只要身体健康，其他任何事都无关紧要。
data.enText: As long as you have your health, nothing else matters.
the work of providing medical services

data.chText: 各政党都在许诺增加医疗开支。
data.enText: All parties are promising to increase spending on health.
the Health Minister
the Department of Health
health insurance
health and safety regulations (= laws that protect the health of people at work)
how successful sth is
the health of your marriage/finances
a clean bill of health
a report that says sb is healthy or that sth is in good condition
drink sb's health
to wish sb good health as you lift your glass, and then drink from it
propose a toast (to sb)
propose sb's health
to ask people to wish sb health, happiness and success by raising their glasses and drinking

data.chText: 我提议为新郎新娘的幸福干杯！
data.enText: I'd like to propose a toast to the bride and groom.
in rude health
looking or feeling very healthy

data.chText: 我提议为新郎新娘的幸福干杯！
data.enText: I'd like to propose a toast to the bride and groom.
in rude health
looking or feeling very healthy

tr: the general condition of body and mind
a healthy state of wellbeing free from disease
example: physicians should be held responsible for the health of their patients

value.def: A person's health is the condition of their body and the extent to which it is free from illness or is able to resist illness.

example.ex: Caffeine is bad for your health.
example.tran: 咖啡因对人体健康有害。

value.def: Health is a state in which a person is not suffering from any illness and is feeling well.

example.ex: In hospital they nursed me back to health.
example.tran: 在医院里他们对我进行治疗及护理，使我恢复了健康。

value.def: When you drink to someone's health or drink their health, you have a drink as a sign of wishing them health and happiness.

example.ex: In the village pub, regulars drank the health of John and his father.
example.tran: 在村子的酒馆里，老顾客们举杯祝愿约翰和他的父亲身体健康。

value.def: The health of something such as an organization or a system is its success and the fact that it is working well.

example.ex: There's no way to predict the future health of the banking industry.
example.tran: 银行业未来是否会兴旺发达根本无法预测。
